sourceOrganization.name: NIAID BRCs Program
sourceOrganization.abstract: The NIAID-funded Bioinformatics Resource Centers (BRCs) provide computational platforms for data sharing, analysis, and interoperability in infectious disease research. These centers support sustainable, production-level bioinformatics tools for the scientific community.
sourceOrganization.description: The NIAID-funded Bioinformatics Resource Centers (BRCs) provide data-driven, production-level, sustainable computational platforms to enable sharing and access to data, portable computational tools, and standards that support interoperability for the infectious diseases research community. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/bioinformatics-resource-centers
alternateName: Bioinformatics Resource Centers for Infectious Diseases
